SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@UNIX
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
echo Determining current association of subnet &UC4RB_AWS_SUBNET_ID#..
output=$(java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute "$EC2_HOME"/bin/ec2-describe-network-acls &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# --filter "association.subnet-id=&UC4RB_AWS_SUBNET_ID#")
ret=$? if [ "$ret" -gt "0" ]; then echo Error: Cannot determine association for the given subnet exit $ret fi
result=$(printf "%s\n" "$output" | grep ^ASSOCIATION.*&UC4RB_AWS_SUBNET_ID#.*) array=($result) acl_assoc_id=${array[1]}
echo "Found the association $acl_assoc_id"
echo Replacing network ACL association..
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute "$EC2_HOME"/bin/ec2-replace-network-acl-association &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# $acl_assoc_id -a &UC4RB_AWS_ACL_ID#
ret=$? if [ "$ret" -gt "0" ]; then echo Failed to replace network ACL association exit $ret fi
echo Successfully replace network ACL association
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "ASSOCIATION*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1)
! Extract the delimiter character from this line, usually the tab character : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 12, 1) : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 13) ! Replace the tab character with single space to easier to split : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ")
: DEFINE &results#, string, 2 : FILL &results#[] = STR_SPLIT(&output_line#, " ")
: SET &UC4RB_OUT_ACL_ASSOC_ID# = &results#[1] : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_ACL_ASSOC_ID#, , "WORKFLOW"
: PRINT 'New network ACL association ID: &UC4RB_OUT_ACL_ASSOC_ID#'
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
